text: The Royal Automobile Club is a group of people. The group has two locations. There is one location in London. There is another location in Woodcote Park in Surrey. At these locations, you can find places to eat, places to sleep, and places to play sports. The RAC is well known for providing roadside assistance. However, this part of the RAC is no longer a formal part of the club. Category:Organisations based in London
title: Royal Automobile Club
